QuestsSorted.NameClass:
READ ME:
To get portal position and Entry ID: - Click on menu "Tools" > "Helper Tools" - In "Helper tools" window, replace text "GameObject Name" by the portal name (you can get portal name in game when you put mouse over it). - In "Helper tools" window, click on button "GameObject info by name" - You can found Entry ID in first lline (sample, in "EntryIdObjects .Add(242447); // Mailbox : http://www.wowhead.com/object=242447" the id is 242447) - You can found Position in second line (sample, in "HotSpots.Add(new Vector3(-1858.24f, 5388.41f, -12.4281f));" position X is -1858.24, position Y is 5388.41 and Z is -12.4281)
To take portal:
- In the step 2 (While), replace "-1831.95f, 5298.3f, -12.42793f" by portal position. - In the step 2 (While), replace "300" by portal max distance (if distance is bigger at the value, portal is skipped)).
- In the step 3 (RunCode), replace "-1831.95f, 5298.3f, -12.42793f" by portal position. - In the step 3 (RunCode), replace "18940" by the portal entry ID.
